account_id.description: Microsoft account identifier owning the OneDrive content.

path.description: OneDrive path to list (must start with '/'; parent directory segments and reserved characters are rejected).

folder_id.description: Optional Microsoft Graph driveItem identifier; overrides path when provided.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (1-500).

use_cache.description: Whether cached results may be used if available.

force_refresh.description: Bypass cache and fetch fresh data when true.
